8a7c382e40f86c9ec8c0b89a4594e10b6236f3c80e7d30b","dweb:/ipfs/QmYBMhdZTbcvSNV2aeDKoo5EBPGxw2xWGAvyeTMFJSXS1m"]}},"version":1}

returns._0: accuracy Accuracy in basis points (0-10000, where 10000 = 100%)

params.initialOwner: The address that will own this contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

getAccuracy(address,uint32).notice: Calculate accuracy percentage for a user in a topic

getUserExpertise(address,uint32).notice: Get user's expertise in a specific topic

getUserScore(address,uint32).notice: Get user's expertise score (with initial score if never attempted)

getUserTopics(address).notice: Get all topics a user has engaged with

recordChallengeAttempt(address,uint32,bo.notice: Record a challenge attempt (called by Challenge contract via ReputationEngine)

setPeerRatingContract(address).notice: Set the peer rating contract address (can only be done once)

setReputationEngine(address).notice: Set the reputation engine address (can only be done once)

updateExpertiseScore(address,uint32,uint.notice: Update user's expertise score (called by ReputationEngine)
